item.title: JSON-RPC v1.0.1.2
item.description:
Product: JSON-RPC v1.0.1.2
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 01 Dec 2023 09:44:49 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Library for encoding and decoding JSON-RPC 2.0 request and response objects

https://www.jsonrpc.org/specification

Release Notes: [1.0.1]
- change methods for creating request and response objects (use Make JSON Object instead of Set Item)
- change to response encoding: use same method as request object. Single elements (float, string, etc) will be converted to an array. This is done so that parsing of params and results can be done in the same way.
- updated palettes
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Remote Control v1.0.0.1
item.description:
Product: Remote Control v1.0.0.1
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 21 Nov 2023 16:28:42 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Parent library for sending messages to programs occupying different application instances, ie, LabVIEW running on different computers, multiple instances of LabVIEW on a single computer, or compiled applications. By itself this library does not implement a specific or even working communication protocol, but provides abstract methods that can be overridden by, for example, ZMQ, MQTT, etc.

Release Notes: [1.0.0]
- First build as stand-alone package
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
